Kicker {1}{U} and/or {1}{R} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{U} and/or {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
If Roavolver was kicked with its {1}{U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and has “When Roavolver deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.”
If Roavolver was kicked with its {1}{R} kicker, when it enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.
